content.text:
[@Ettore](@Vn+Q5zFIgTo9LodkFjdiCUJ0JePaaG+TMiHkMyLXaQI=.ed25519)

Mysteriosu! Can you see my messages? If you haven't already, I'd try restarting Patchwork and waiting until it's done "scuttling" or "indexing" or whatever it says at the top.

If you're running it from the command-line, you may get some useful error messages there, otherwise you could check out the Chromium developer console (I think it's `Ctrl+Shift+I`?) to see if there are errors there. Sorry you're having trouble, that sounds frustrating!
